titleInfo.title: Emergence or reduction?: Essays on the prospects of nonreductive physicalism

bibliographicCitation.ama: Beckermann A. Supervenience, emergence, and reduction. In: Beckermann A, ed. Emergence or reduction?: Essays on the prospects of nonreductive physicalism. Grundlagen der Kommunikation und Kognition : Bibliotheksausgabe. Berlin [u.a.]: de Gruyter; 1992: 94-118.
